instruction: I'm looking for an action-packed movie with a tough hero on a battleship.
output: If you want high-stakes action and a badass hero, check out Under Siege! Steven Seagal totally rocks as the Navy SEAL who takes on terrorists on a battleship. 🚢💥 Perfect for some edge-of-your-seat thrills!

instruction: Got any movies with cool martial arts and a navy setting?
